author: Holman W. Jenkins, Jr.
title: Big Tech Takes Us to the Unknown
text:
If anybody does not yet understand they are paying for their “free” Facebook, Google, etc. by handing over their private data for use in advertising, please lead such people gently out into the woods and leave them there.
In truth, many of those now canceling their Facebook accounts didn’t mind when their Facebook data was used to sell them pro-Obama messages. They only mind when Facebook helps identify people potentially receptive to pro-Trump messages.
...
